p: All A. flavus strains used in this study are given in Table S8. A. flavus was cultured on liquid yeast extract-sucrose agar (YES) and potato dextrose agar (PDA) and the A. flavus were then grown under several conditions. For the low temperature and pH stresses, 10 6 conidia were resuspended in fresh YES media at 29°C or YES media (pH 5, with hydrochloride) at 37°C. For the oxidative and hyperosmotic stresses, 10 6 conidia were resuspended in fresh YES media containing additional H 2O 2 (0.8 M) or sodium chloride (1 M), respectively.
